Raiden analysis
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Archived Topics From Prior Years: MR3 Mayor's Cups: Raiden analysis
By torey_luvullo on Thursday, May 23, 2002 - 04:20 am:

I think Freddy B. is good enough to win. I will be watching the matchup between * and Ryukyu closely, however. We have not had such a clear int/pow dichotomy within a breed in any mayor's cup yet.

First, *'s techs are more advanced, and may just be better techs. Furthermore, * has fast footwork - this often proves very helpful. Finally, * has chosen pow as his "neglected stat"; Ryukyu has chosen int.

So * has certain advantages that may help. Whether the accumulation of these slight advantages will overcome Ryukyu's edge in composite stats [and that 750 lif of *] is an intriguing question. If I had to guess, I would guess "yes" and choose * by a 3-2 margin.

GO *!

By Monster Fenrick on Thursday, May 23, 2002 - 07:20 am:

Doh!.. didn't read slow enough i guess... sorry Torey!

Fen's "Look'at"
--------------------
* techs are Long and Short range.
RyuKyu techs are medium and Short Range.

both monsters have about = Hit %, but RyuKyu has higher Damage per attack. at first hand i'd say Ryukyu will beat * (since * only has 750 LIF)... but RyuKyu lacks in the DEF area... so it is almost an even playing feild.

Then comes *'s wonderful charactaristics list... I personally don't think it will be enough though. with *'s low Life, and lower damage per attack.. past tournaments have shown a trend of lower damage attacks just not quite being enough. Hopefully, for me, this proves true again.

Regardless... if * VS Ryukyu does not go into a 5th round for the win, i'll be dissappointed.

By Deadbuffalo on Thursday, May 23, 2002 - 01:39 pm:

you're right in that * doesn't do enough damage. He won't have to :). Gutsdown on both techs is enough to seriously hamper the effectiveness on such low guts regen, high guts cost monsters. As for damage, do not forget that both bird's have techs that are the other's weakness. I have to say this will be a good fight. I'm not sure which one will win. Phoenix combo could be a one hit KO... if Ryu gets it off.. and if it hits.

Regardless... if Ryukyu VS * does not go into a 5th round for the win, i'll be dissappointed.
